contacts S4 class and methods

Source: R/contacts.R
contacts.Rd

contacts S4 class and methods

features method for objects of class contacts.

features<- method for objects of class contacts.

pairsFile method for objects of class contacts.

pairsFile<- method for objects of class contacts.

anchors method for objects of class contacts.

regions method for objects of class contacts.

summary method for objects of class contacts.

Show method for objects of class contacts.

contacts(
  cool_path,
  resolution = NULL,
  focus = NULL,
  metadata = list(),
  features = S4Vectors::SimpleList(loops = GenomicRanges::GRanges(), borders =
    GenomicRanges::GRanges(), compartments = GenomicRanges::GRanges(), viewpoints =
    GenomicRanges::GRanges()),
  pairs = NULL
)

# S4 method for contacts
length(x)

# S4 method for contacts,ANY,ANY,ANY
[(x, i)

matrixType(x)

coolPath(x)

# S4 method for contacts
seqinfo(x)

resolutions(x)

# S4 method for contacts
resolution(x)

bins(x)

focus(x)

# S4 method for contacts
interactions(x)

scores(x, name)

scores(x, name) <- value

features(x, name)

features(x, name) <- value

pairsFile(x, name)

pairsFile(x) <- value

# S4 method for contacts
anchors(x)

# S4 method for contacts
regions(x)

# S4 method for contacts
summary(object)

# S4 method for contacts
show(object)

Arguments

cool_path

Path of a (m)cool file

resolution

Resolution to use with mcool file

focus

focus Chr. coordinates for which interaction counts are extracted from the .(m)cool file. Can be provided as a character string or as a GRanges object

metadata

list of metadata

features

features provided as a named SimpleList

pairs

Path to an associated .pairs file

x

A contacts object.

i

a range or boolean vector.

name

name

value

value

object

A contacts object.

Value

a new contacts object.

Slots

focus

Chr. coordinates for which interaction counts are extracted from the .(m)cool file.

metadata

metadata associated with the .(m)cool file.

seqinfo

Seqinfo, deduced from the largest resolution available in the .(m)cool file.

resolutions

Resolutions available in the .(m)cool file.

current_resolution

Current resolution

bins

Genomic bins (computed on-the-fly) of seqinfo at the current resolution

interactions

Genomic Interactions extracted from the .(m)cool object

scores

Available interaction scores.

features

Genomic features associated with the dataset (e.g. loops, borders, etc...)

pairsFile

path for the .pairs file associated with the .(m)cool file

matrixType

Type of contacts matrix (sparse, full, aggr, ratio, ...)

coolPath

Path of (m)cool file

Examples

library(HiContacts)
data(contacts_yeast)
contacts_yeast
#> sparse `contacts` object with 74,360 interactions over 802 regions 
#> coolPath: /home/rsg/.cache/R/ExperimentHub/36d590c5583_7752 
#> focus: II 
#> ------------
#> metadata(0):
#> resolutions(5): 1000 2000 4000 8000 16000
#> current resolution(1000): 74360 interactions in memory 
#> bins: 12079 
#> regions: 802 
#> scores(2): raw balanced 
#> features: loops(0) borders(0) compartments(0) viewpoints(0) 
#> pairs: N/A 
length(contacts_yeast)
#> [1] 74360
contacts_yeast[1:10]
#> sparse `contacts` object with 10 interactions over 802 regions 
#> coolPath: /home/rsg/.cache/R/ExperimentHub/36d590c5583_7752 
#> focus: II 
#> ------------
#> metadata(0):
#> resolutions(5): 1000 2000 4000 8000 16000
#> current resolution(1000): 10 interactions in memory 
#> bins: 12079 
#> regions: 802 
#> scores(2): raw balanced 
#> features: loops(0) borders(0) compartments(0) viewpoints(0) 
#> pairs: N/A 
matrixType(contacts_yeast)
#> [1] "sparse"
coolPath(contacts_yeast)
#> [1] "/home/rsg/.cache/R/ExperimentHub/36d590c5583_7752"
seqinfo(contacts_yeast)

#>   seqnames seqlengths isCircular genome
